Reviews.Title: Take it or leave it...
Reviews.Author: venus
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my mom to get her away from the antique cell she was using. She insisted that I not get her the latest phone either... imagine my heartbreakThe phone looks nice just as it appears on amazon, and has a pretty friendly user interface. Has a touch screen and number key pad.There is a cool lock feature so that nothing is pressed when your ear is next to phone while talking. Speaker phone works well and is very clear. I can't speak for the camera... For what it's worth, I should be grateful that she can at least receive photos now...In all fairness the phone works well and is good for the price if you don't care for anything other than talking and texting.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Choice....
Reviews.Author: Jesus Perez
Reviews.Content: Excelent Choice. Nokia continues to surprise with this cell. I have used other brands of equipment and nothing better than Nokia.

Reviews.Title: Phone is defective..too late to return it
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Y. Lomongo
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone last year for my Mom who lives overseas. The phone could not read her sim card. She tried using a different sim card and still the same. Brought it to the phone company and they could not figure out what was wrong with it. Brought it to an IT company and they said the phone is defective because they could not even reset it to try unlocking it again.

Reviews.Title: bad phone
Reviews.Author: medhanit gashaw
Reviews.Content: They said the phone is unlocked, it is not. Doesn't have memory. It doesn't look like the advertised photos at all.

Reviews.Title: Phone won't turn on after using several days!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my mom who don't know how to use smartphones and just use cell phones for calls. As a smartphone user, this phone is the most basic of phones and doesn't offer that many options even for customization and such. However, the biggest problem is that it won't turn on after using it for several days. My mom barely used it and when charging it one day, it automatically turn itself off and won't turn on again.
